main event: On 7 August 1949, an unidentified aerial object was observed over Lake Pontchartrain, New Orleans, Louisiana.
interesting points: The object was spherical in shape and glowing bright orange with a gaseous trail., It was estimated to be traveling at approximately 650 miles per hour., The observation lasted around 30 seconds., The object was seen at an altitude of approximately 2500 feet., The observer, a Navy veteran and licensed pilot, described it as resembling a man-made aircraft.
witness description: A Navy veteran and a civilian, both with credibility based on their backgrounds.
